definition: the Antarctic Peninsula (jutting out towards South America)

sentences.english: Antarctica is one of the last real wildernesses left on the earth.
sentences.chinese: 南極洲是地球上所剩不多的曠野之一。

sentences.english: A high mountain range, the Trans–Antarctic range, runs from east to west, cutting the continent in two.
sentences.chinese: 一條橫貫南極洲的山脈，從東到西將南極洲分爲兩半。

sentences.english: A high mountain range, the Trans–Antarctic range, runs from east to west, cutting the continent in two.
sentences.chinese: 一條橫貫南極洲的山脈，從東到西將南極洲分爲兩半。

sentences.english: I live on all the continents of the world except Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 我住在世界上除南極洲以外的所有的陸地上。

sentences.english: I live on all the continents except Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 除了南極洲，我住在世界上所有的陸地上。

sentences.english: The ice shelves currently insulate the Antartic continent from wind.
sentences.chinese: 冰架目前使南極洲和風隔絕。

sentences.english: Snowed yesterday in N Y. Fuck this state I'm moving to Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 昨天紐約還下雪了，乾死美國，我要移民去南極洲了。

sentences.english: A high mountain range, the Trans?CAntarctic range, runs from east to west, cutting the continent in two.
sentences.chinese: 一條橫貫南極洲的山脈，從東到西將南極洲分爲兩半。

sentences.english: A high mountain range, the Trans?CAntarctic range, runs from east to west, cutting the continent in two.
sentences.chinese: 一條橫貫南極洲的山脈，從東到西將南極洲分爲兩半。

sentences.english: From Antarctica, three major " gulfs " extend northward.
sentences.chinese: 有三個大的“海灣”從南極洲向北延伸。

sentences.english: Light pollution exists on every continent except Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 除南極洲外，各大洲均存在光污染。

sentences.english: They are very adaptable, populating all continents, except for the cold one.
sentences.chinese: 除了最冷的南極洲外，它們適宜在任何大洲種植。

sentences.english: The drop-dead beauty of Antarctica cannot be explained enough.
sentences.chinese: 南極洲那令人窒息的美語言是無法說清楚的。

sentences.english: The collection includes sand from all continents, including Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 這些沙子樣本來自全球各大洲，連南極洲都有。

sentences.english: The Emperors huddle together to protect themselves from the extreme cold of Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 帝企鵝們互相擁擠在一起來預防南極洲極度的寒冷。

sentences.english: New Zealand is a South Pacific country located midway between the Equator and the South Pole.
sentences.chinese: 新西蘭是一個南太平洋國家，位於赤道和南極洲之間。
